subject: Soccer
UEFA Champions League (Soccer)
lead_paragraph: Cristiano Ronaldo, Gareth Bale and Karim Benzema scored two goals each Wednesday, leading Real Madrid over Schalke in the opener of their second-round Champions League matchup.
snippet: Cristiano Ronaldo, Gareth Bale and Karim Benzema scored two goals each Wednesday, leading Real Madrid over Schalke in the opener of their second-round Champions League matchup.
